type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Soul Speed

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_soul_speed).

Modifies the amount of Soul Speed levels of an entity.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_soul_speed`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Soul Speed

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_soul_speed).

Modifies the amount of Soul Speed levels of an entity.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_soul_speed`



---

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.

block_condition.description: If set, this will determine what blocks the soul speed effect will activate on.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this will determine what blocks the soul speed effect will activate on.
